casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Harris.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Harris (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 3.]

(No. 98-719 Submitted July 8, 1998 Decided November 10, 1998.) *4Jonathan E. Coughlan, Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Paula Castle Harris, pro se. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
